notes: Successive attacks with Witch Blade do not stack, but refresh the duration instead.
The attacks first apply the debuff, the damage start ticking after 1 second.
Deals magic damage in 1 second intervals, starting 1 second after the debuff is applied, resulting in 3 instances.
Does not work against wards and buildings. Works against couriers.
The damage over time is lethal.
abilities.description: Causes your next attack to apply a poison for 3 seconds, slowing by 25% and dealing 1 times Intelligence as damage every second.

name: Witch Blade
description: A spiteful blade inadvertently possessed by the soul of its incautious creator.
